title: Blood Slave
description: Abducted as a blood slave to a sadistic master vampire, Darrian fears he will never be free again. Then, Master Broman is killed, but instead of freedom, Darrian is taken to another vampire clan. A vampire clan nothing like Master Broman's. And the master...Kylor...is not only a surprise, but apparently...his mate.
author: C.R. Guiliano
